statements: DELETE FROM past_concerts WHERE concert_id = 101 AND attendance > 500;
DELETE FROM past_concerts WHERE concert_date < '2022-01-01' AND reviews <> 'Great show!';
DELETE FROM Attendance WHERE concert_id = '123abc' AND attendee_name = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM Setlist WHERE song_order = 3 AND concert_id = '456def';
DELETE FROM Setlist WHERE concert_id = 'ccbc4b02-b7f0-42f7-bc72-29b073119246' AND song_order = 3;
DELETE FROM Attendance WHERE attendee_name = 'John Doe' AND concert_id = 'd27e17b9-5574-4c45-9773-6d40d170175f';
DELETE FROM reviews WHERE concert_date < '2022-01-01' AND rating < 3;
DELETE FROM Venues WHERE city = 'New York';
